messages.title: offering real change to the old “left/right”
messages.content: UKIP stands for British freedom, the freedom to govern ourselves, with elected “real” people, with all life experience that normal life on the ground brings.

messages.title: BIG CHANGE NEEDS BOLD DECISIONS
messages.content: Be BOLD and vote for a real chance to shake up the “old left rights” to the bone! Put your X by UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP believes that government should serve the people, not the other way round. Enough is enough... time for a change!
The traffic and parking chaos in our City and the anti business policies of the Labour-led Council and Greens are a taste of things to come, if they get their hands on the levers of power.

The Tories promise change of UK/EU. ‘We Believe in Britain’. They promise to renegotiate the EU and reduce immigration then invite Turkey to join. They promise a referendum, but we all know it will probably never happen. A UKIP government guarantees one, but you need to vote for UKIP to ensure it happens!

issues.brexitEurope: They promise to renegotiate the EU and reduce immigration then invite Turkey to join. They promise a referendum, but we all know it will probably never happen. A UKIP government guarantees one, but you need to vote for UKIP to ensure it happens!

housing.content: The traffic and parking chaos in our City and the anti business policies of the Labour-led Council and Greens are a taste of things to come, if they get their hands on the levers of power.

leaflet.personalStatement: With all the experience that normal life on the ground brings, after 40 years of working I want to give something back, and that something is your country!
